entities.name: Hearing voices
entities.description: a condition where one hears voices no one else can hear. This is mentioned as a bad sign even in the wizarding world.

entities.name: wizarding world
entities.description: a world of magic and wizards. It is mentioned that hearing voices is not a good sign even in this world.

entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: the main character who is thinking about the voices he hears and his connection to Salazar Slytherin.

relationships.description: Harry Potter thinks that hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.
Harry is growing dread that he was somehow connected with Salazar Slytherin.
